summary: A body's found on the shore of a lake. Police Chief Jesse Stone starts an investigation. It turns out to be a pregnant high school student. There's also a case of a persistent wife beater. Jesse starts seeing a shrink and dating.
cast: Tom Selleck|Viola Davis|Kohl Sudduth|Orla Brady|Gary Basaraba|John Diehl|Debra Christofferson|Mae Whitman|Matt Barr|Edward Edwards|Brendan Kelly|Liisa Repo-Martell|Kerri Smith|Stephen McHattie|Maria Ricossa|Vito Rezza|David Christoffel|John Beale|Steven Flynn|William Devane|Carolyn Fitzgibbons|Rhonda McLean|Michael Ha|Murlane Carew|Glenn Lefchak|John Maclaren|Gil Anderson|Joe the Dog|David Wm. Marsh
title: Jesse Stone: Destino paraíso
